title: Chappelle Joke + Alan Moore's Promethea'n Prophecy
description:
Chappelle is on his last mile and Jonathan Pageau takes on Alan Moore right as his prophecy unfolds!

p.s. I only stopped following because he was too hard not to troll, fixed that. Also totally sorry about getting the name wrong, but not sorry enough to reshoot the standup bit.

Mileage:  /watch?v=y1o99QLzewA
Pageau Nemesis:  /watch?v=_DBkN5_LQJQ
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Promethea
Teller Oprah:  /watch?v=UJRjXC2QBzQ
God's Dog GoGo:  https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/god-s-dog-graphic-novel/coming_soon

Here's a Discord for people who don't hate me:
https://discord.gg/W8tnFw5t9p

Here's a Patreon for people who want to encourage me:
https://www.patreon.com/grimgriz
